lead_paragraph: Turkmenistan stopped gas exports to Iran on Sunday in a long-running dispute over arrears, Iran's state gas company said, days after Tehran said the issue had been temporarily resolved.
snippet: Turkmenistan stopped gas exports to Iran on Sunday in a long-running dispute over arrears, Iran's state gas company said, days after Tehran said the issue had been temporarily resolved....

headline.main: Turkmenistan Halts Gas Exports to Iran Over Payment Row, Tehran Says
headline.print_headline: Turkmenistan Halts Gas Exports to Iran Over Payment Row, Tehran Says
